ComicInfo.Summary:
Trapped in a three-sided struggle between his fellow Pathfinders, an ancient wizard, and the agents of death itself, Valeros struggles to understand what his life has become and retain control of his own living body! The Spire of Bones story continues in this tale written by Pathfinder developer Crystal Frasier with art by Tom Garcia (Mercy Thompson, Pathfinder: Hollow Mountain).
Contains an ongoing Starfinder bonus story, a Pathfinder RPG rules appendix, and a bonus pull-out poster map!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Marco Santucci | 1 | B | Cover B | Vincenzo Federici | 2 | C | Cover C | Tom Mandrake | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Tom Mandrake | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Marco Santucci | 5 |
